charts.name: myChart
charts.csql: SELECT DayName(left(created,10)) AS Day, count(tid) AS noTweets FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)<=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')AND left(created,10)>DATE_FORMAT(date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -7 DAY),'%d-%M-%Y') GROUP By DayName(left(created,10))
